actions.name: CreateMonitor
actions.description: Grants permission to create a monitor

actions.name: CreateScope
actions.description: Grants permission to create a scope

actions.name: DeleteMonitor
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a monitor

actions.name: DeleteScope
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a scope

actions.name: GetMonitor
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a monitor

actions.name: GetQueryResultsMonitorTopContributors
actions.description: Grants permission to get the results of a query that retrieves top contributors data for a monitor

actions.name: GetQueryResultsWorkloadInsightsTopContributors
actions.description: Grants permission to get the results of a query that retrieves top contributors for workload insights

actions.name: GetQueryResultsWorkloadInsightsTopContributorsData
actions.description: Grants permission to get the results of a query that retrieves top contributors data points for workload insights

actions.name: GetQueryStatusMonitorTopContributors
actions.description: Grants permission to get the status of a query that retrieves top contributors data for a monitor

actions.name: GetQueryStatusWorkloadInsightsTopContributors
actions.description: Grants permission to get the status of a query that retrieves top contributors for workload insights

actions.name: GetQueryStatusWorkloadInsightsTopContributorsData
actions.description: Grants permission to get the status of a query that retrieves top contributors data points for workload insights

actions.name: GetScope
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a scope

actions.name: ListMonitors
actions.description: Grants permission to list all monitors in an account and their statuses

actions.name: ListScopes
actions.description: Grants permission to get all scopes for an account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource

actions.name: Publish
actions.description: Grants permission to publish a report

actions.name: StartQueryMonitorTopContributors
actions.description: Grants permission to start a query for retrieving top contributors data for a monitor

actions.name: StartQueryWorkloadInsightsTopContributors
actions.description: Grants permission to start a query for retrieving top contributors data for workload insights

actions.name: StartQueryWorkloadInsightsTopContributorsData
actions.description: Grants permission to start a query for retrieving top contributors data points for workload insights

actions.name: StopQueryMonitorTopContributors
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a query for retrieving top contributors data for a monitor

actions.name: StopQueryWorkloadInsightsTopContributors
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a query for retrieving top contributors for workload insights

actions.name: StopQueryWorkloadInsightsTopContributorsData
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a query for retrieving top contributors data points for workload insights

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

actions.name: UpdateMonitor
actions.description: Grants permission to update a monitor

actions.name: UpdateScope
actions.description: Grants permission to update a scope
